about_the_game:
What kind of game is this?


This is a 3D survival game, produced by Unreal Engine 5, supports first and third person modes, has rich (bad) plots, and also supports Steam multiplayer online, you can survive and build together, up to 5 people.

What is the consumption pattern? Will there be price cuts or new content in the future?


The game is a one-time buyout system, and the cost is not high. This is the first independent game I developed, the plot and gameplay are difficult to reach a passing level, please forgive me. There will be a half-price promotion when the game is released, and it will be changed to the normal price later. If the game sells well, probable develop DLC or other content.

What is the general story of the game?


The company encounters statutory holidays and has seven days off. At the invitation of friends, LingYan Fan and four partners went to the island for vacation. But because of budget problems, everyone can only charter a small boat. Encountered a hurricane on the way, the ship sank at sea, LingYan Fan and four partners were stranded on a lonely island, with no mobile phone signal and extra food, they could only survive on the island, and prayed for a ship or plane to pass by, but they didn't know it Yes, this island actually hides many strange things...

What if I don't like the game?


I can't do anything about this, my ability is limited. You can post negative comments in the comment area and submit a refund, and Steam customer service will deal with it as soon as possible. If the refund fails, you can send the screenshot of the purchase and your Steam information to my email, and I will deal with it for you as soon as I see it.

Finally, thank you for viewing my game. If you have already purchased it, please be merciful. It is not easy to make an independent game. After all, I have to make a living. ————《人世间工作室》Creation
